items.text: tossed up on off, he drives straight to cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, no run

items.text: fired in quickly, he drives straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, no run

items.text: tossed up with some grip and turn back into Miller, he defends from the crease
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, no run

items.text: tossed up higher, he's forward and defending again
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, no run

items.text: flatter on leg, he clips this with the turn through square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 1 run

items.text: looped very high outside off, he waited and hammered this at cover but the man at cover gets a hand on it to slow it down and it runs to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: floated outside off, he covers up in defence
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, no run

items.text: flatter on off, he's back and working this straight to midwicket
items.postText: DrAmit: "Why Miller now so early?"  Presume it's the left-hand right-hand combination and maybe some instructions to accelerate once he gets set
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, no run

items.text: drifting down leg, he glances this behind square and a misfield in the ring allows them to get a couple
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 2 runs

items.text: he dances down, not quite to the pitch but pushes on the up through cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, a square drive to deep cover-point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.text: flatter on off, he's back and working this with the bottom hand through midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: fuller, he jabs this with the bottom hand on the bounce back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, no run

items.text: flatter and fuller again, he pushes it off the front foot to cover
items.postText: Venkat: "As long as Faf is there, the batsmen at the other end can always go after the bowling and SA will still have a decent chance."
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle, he stays leg side and pushes it to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, no run

items.text: skips down the track and works this straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, no run

items.text: shorter, pitching outside leg, he's back and whipping this to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: pushed through on middle, he stays still and punches to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 1 run

items.text: dances down the track and drives neatly to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: shorter length, he sits back and pulls powerfully but straight to deep midwicket
items.postText: Pradipto: "SA should have got Duminy in as he is much better Vs spin and kept Miller back for the last 10 overs. To nurdle the spinners is not Miller's game " He is pretty adept normally but certainly looks down on confidence.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 1 run

items.text: flatter on off, he is back and punching this firmly to deep cover-point
items.postText: Sun has poked through the clouds
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.text: shorter, he backs away outside leg and whacks this straight back and at Mosaddek
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, no run

items.text: drifting into leg, he whips this through square leg with a flourish
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: flatter on leg, he drives off the back foot down to long on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.text: he backs away and hits this off the back foot over the fence at wide long off! This skill and power required for that is staggering! What a way to reach 50!
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, SIX runs
